title: HKFP報道：Independence activists urge US to punish HK officials

replies.msg:
https://www.hongkongfp.com/2018/10/15/independence-activists-urge-us-punish-hong-kong-officials-rights-violations-scuffle-unfolds-outside-govt-hq/

HONG KONG POLITICS & PROTEST
Independence activists urge US to punish Hong Kong officials over ‘rights violations’ as scuffle unfolds outside Gov’t HQ

Around 100 independence activists and their supporters marched to the US Consulate General on Sunday demanding that the United States freeze assets belonging to Hong Kong government officials under their jurisdiction. The activists said the Hong Kong officials had “committed human rights violations” by pushing undemocratic policies.

推
等睇聽日各界反應
